watch.expression: "SELECT `date`, `created`,`action`, `amount`,`name`, `comment` FROM retailpointactions rpa LEFT JOIN marketers m on m.id = rpa.marketer_id WHERE rpa.retailpoint_id = " . $shop_id . " AND rpa.date='" . $dates . "' order by `created`"
"SELECT `amount` FROM retailpointactions rpa WHERE rpa.retailpoint_id = " . $shop_id . " AND rpa.date<'" . $dates . "' AND `action`='".$actions['end']."' order by `date` DESC limit 1"

"SELECT `date`, `created`,`action`, `amount`,`name`, `comment` FROM retailpointactions rpa LEFT JOIN marketers m on m.id = rpa.marketer_id WHERE rpa.retailpoint_id = " . $shop_id . " AND rpa.date='" . $dates . "' order by `created`"

"SELECT `date`, `created`,`action`, `amount`,`name`, `comment` FROM retailpointactions rpa LEFT JOIN marketers m on m.id = rpa.marketer_id WHERE rpa.retailpoint_id = " . $shop_id . " AND rpa.date='" . $dates . "' order by `created`"
